author: randomishwalk
content: Is 76 nodes a decent enough sampling size?

author: 3xmd1559sporebraytondingo
content: This is everyone's favourite paper on the topic: https://tik-old.ee.ethz.ch/file//49318d3f56c1d525aabf7fda78b23fc0/P2P2013_041.pdf

author: 3xmd1559sporebraytondingo
content: (Information Propagation in the Bitcoin Network, Christian Decker,∗ Roger Wattenhofer†)

author: 3xmd1559sporebraytondingo
content: It should be large enough, however there's probably some selection bias: there are a high proportion of European nodes, and quality of connection may very.

author: randomishwalk
content:
Right yeah that was gonna be my next Q. Makes sense. Assuming if the distribution of nodes by geography in this sample roughly matches the total distribution of all nodes, probably a good sample. Wonder the specific client used may also impact this?
